About.title: SHAPHANG NGI
About.description: Ka Amicizia Life Science ka thmu ban long ka nongialehkai kaba lah ban shaniah & kaba la sngewtynnad ha ka liang ka ri dohkha, ri jingri bad ri um da kaba ai ia ki mar kiba kyrpang & kiba bha sha ki nongthied. Ngi aiti ban wanrah ia ki lad ki lynti kiba thymmai bad ban ai ia ki mar kiba kyrpang ba la shna ha ka jaka shna dawai ba la pynskhem da ka GMP & ISO na ka bynta ban pyndonkam ha ki doktor mrad.

checklist.innovative: Ki mar ba thymmai bad ba rem dor
checklist.cgmp: Ka CGMP ha ka jingshna ia ki mar
checklist.employee: Ka jingïashim bynta jong ki nongtrei bad ka jingpynbha
checklist.compliance: Ka jingbud ryntih ia ki jingdonkam jong ka ain, ain bad jingpynbeit

MissionVision.mission_desc: Ban ai ïa ki dawai mrad kiba kyrpang & ki jingbam ba tei met ba la pynwandur ha ka rukom kaba thymmai & kaba thymmai, hapoh ki kyndon kiba bha tam kiba ailad ïa ngi ban ai ïa ka jingpynbeit kaba bha tam ban ai sha ki nongthied ba khatduh jong ngi.
MissionVision.vision_desc: Ban long kawei na ki Kompani ba pawnam jong ki dawai na ka bynta ka koit ka khiah jong ki mrad, ym tang ha ka jingdie hynrei wat ha ka jingpynmih jingmut thymmai, ka jingthaw dor bad ka jingtreikam kaba bha ryngkat bad ka jingsngew ba khraw jong ka jingkitkhlieh ha ka imlang sahlang.

team.title: KYNHUN
team.desc: Ka kynhun jong ki briew kiba don kajuh ka jingmut kiba pyni ia ki sap kiba kyrpang katba ki dang ialeh ban jop.

professionalism.title: KA JINGTREI
professionalism.desc: La pynpaw da ka Jinglong Hok, Ka Jinglong Hok & Ka Jingburom ha baroh ki jingiadei kam jong ngi.

excellence.title: KA JINGBHA
excellence.desc: Ka jingaiti ban poi sha jrong bad sha jrong ban pynpoi ia ki jingjop ki bym lah ban ianujor.

quality.title: KA JINGBHA
quality.desc: Ki mar kiba bha tam ryngkat bad ki jingpeit bniah kiba pyrkhing ha man la ka kyrdan shna.
